Were He as handsome as popularly suggested (the long hair is very likely false as well), the Bible could have said so since it does describe David as handsome. Christ was very likely as plain and average and nondescript as can be, if not on the (humanly speaking) unattractive side.  So what you're looking at is yet another false Christ that is ultimately the work of Satan.
